name: Oh-My-OpenClaw
description: Multi-agent orchestration plugin — 11 agents, category-based model routing, todo enforcer, ralph loop, agent setup CLI, and custom tools

max_ralph_iterations.description: Maximum ralph loop iterations per session (hard cap: 100)

todo_enforcer_enabled.description: Enable todo continuation injection on agent bootstrap

todo_enforcer_max_failures.description: Max consecutive failures before disabling todo enforcer

comment_checker_enabled.description: Enable AI slop comment detection on tool results

model_routing.description: Custom category→model mappings. Override default model selection per category.

webhook_bridge_enabled.description: Enable webhook bridge for proactive agent messaging (hooks/wake + hooks/agent)

gateway_url.description: OpenClaw gateway URL for webhook bridge. Can also be set via OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_URL env var.

hooks_token.description: Authentication token for gateway webhook hooks. Can also be set via OPENCLAW_HOOKS_TOKEN env var. Auto-generated by omoc-setup.

webhook_reminder_interval_ms.description: Interval between webhook bridge reminder checks (ms, default: 5 minutes)

webhook_subagent_stale_threshold_ms.description: Time before a tracked sub-agent is considered stale (ms, default: 10 minutes)

max_ralph_iterations.label: Ralph Loop Max Iterations
max_ralph_iterations.description: Maximum iterations before auto-stopping the ralph loop

todo_enforcer_enabled.label: Todo Enforcer
todo_enforcer_enabled.description: Inject TODO continuation prompts on agent bootstrap

todo_enforcer_cooldown_ms.label: Cooldown (ms)
todo_enforcer_cooldown_ms.description: Minimum time between TODO enforcer injections

comment_checker_enabled.label: Comment Checker
comment_checker_enabled.description: Detect and flag AI-generated slop comments

model_routing.label: Model Routing
model_routing.description: Custom category→model mappings for task delegation

webhook_bridge_enabled.label: Webhook Bridge
webhook_bridge_enabled.description: Enable proactive agent messaging via gateway webhooks

gateway_url.label: Gateway URL
gateway_url.description: OpenClaw gateway URL for webhook bridge

hooks_token.label: Hooks Token
hooks_token.description: Authentication token for gateway webhook hooks (auto-generated by omoc-setup)

webhook_reminder_interval_ms.label: Reminder Interval (ms)
webhook_reminder_interval_ms.description: How often to check for stale sub-agents and send reminders

webhook_subagent_stale_threshold_ms.label: Stale Threshold (ms)
webhook_subagent_stale_threshold_ms.description: Time before a sub-agent is considered stale and triggers a reminder
